channel.title: [RELEASE]FPVregScape - RuneScape rewritten from scratch in First Person[RELEASE]
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]ATTENTION, THIS IS THE ONLY POST I MADE (THE ORIGINAL AUTHOR OF FPVREGSCAPE) I DID NOT POST THIS ON ANY OTHER SITE THAN ON MOPARSCAPE DO NOT REP ANYONE ON ANY OTHER SITE CLAIMING THIS TO BE THEIR RELEASE:[/b][/size]
For example this faggot: http://www.rune then add locus right behind rune.com/forums/showthread.php?11850-RELEASE-FPVregScape-RuneScape-rewritten-from-scratch-in-First-Person-RELEASE
[center]Alright guys, after working about 2-3 days on this I finally "finished" it. Basicly I dumped a little part of the Varrock map and I textured it and rewrote RuneScape from scratch with another engine (no Java used). It is single player and I didn't have much time to texture the whole map. Also I made some animated weapons but since I animated them in max I had trouble with the FBX exporting format wich made my animations messy, I'm planning to download C4D to remake the animations for the weapons but I'll be able to download it after this weekend because I have internet limits and I got like 2GB left for the next 3 days. This is in the highest level of something that can be alpha, alot of objects aren't collided, half the map isn't textured, it is single player, there are no animations/attack YET. But the main concept of this is just to give you an idea. If this turns out into something I might develop a REAL multiplayer first person RuneScape with upgraded graphics and also this map was dumped from RuneScape HD. Here are some pictures, a video and the [b]download link[/b]: [/center]
[center]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=P7AA772K[/center]
[center]NOTE: If a message appears saying that "The file you are trying to access is temporarily unavailable." it is due to megaupload's server problems, the file is OK but you'll have to come back and download it later.[/center]
[center]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MakuLCb-fyc[/center]
[b]Controls:
Use your mouse to view like you would in for example COD. Use the arrow keys/WASD keys to move around. Use the space bar to jump.[/b]
[IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img190/2394/56825046.png[/img]
[IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img295/5599/unsdfsdftitled.png[/img]
[IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img808/2962/dsfdsf.png[/img]
[b]Credits (Davidi2's request):
- Jagex for the models - 3D Ripper DX for ripping the models - The Unity engine for putting everything together and making the game[/b] ----------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: [RELEASE]FPVregScape - RuneScape rewritten from scratch in First Person[RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Ah, my posts on page 3 was one of my favorite flame wars. And it’s still accurate.

Oh well, I don’t do that shit anymore

item.title: [RELEASE]FPVregScape - RuneScape rewritten from scratch in First Person[RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:135, topic:358394”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=454901.msg3466681#msg3466681 date=1294960109]
Can be done in under 1 minute
[/quote]

Than do it.[/quote]

What is so hard about using 3DRipperDX and throwing it into Unity with the default FPS script. It literally takes as long as client load time combined with unity load time.

Read full topic
